stories.text:
I'm building DoTenX, which is a platform to build no-code automations (like Zapier). Unlike Zapier though, you can use DoTenX to build automations for others!

This means you can use DoTenX automations as the back-end of your applications or you can just use certain automations as helper APIs.

At this stage, you can build automations, and we're making the cloud version ready for high volume traffic. Soon the 2nd part which helps you use DoTenX as a no-code backend will be released.

If you're using Zapier or other alternatives, would love to have a chat and we can give you the same integrations at a very different price. On DoTenX you'll pay $15 per 100K tasks per month.

If anyone is interested to actively use the platform as well, happy to have a chat to give you access and implement the Tasks and Triggers you need. You can use 30K tasks per month for free.

https://github.com/dotenx/dotenx
stories.title: An open source no-code automation and more
